entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 7:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: S 29 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 60 over southern sections late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
